channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Saturday Mash-Up! Live
channel.desc: 2025 Strictly Come Dancing contestant Lewis Cope drops in to talk about the new series and share some secrets from the dancefloor! School?s out for Waterloo Road cast members Cory McClane and Lucy Chambers who try to avoid a sliming. Dermot O?Leary plays Truth or Dare, Joe and Shereen clown around in their latest head-to-head challenge, and cartoon fun with SpongeBob Squarepants. Saturday Mash-Up is totally live... so anything can happen.
